inclusion.criterion: AML, relapsed or refractory to standard therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Unfit for conventional chemotherapy and AML
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: De novo or treated MDS or CMML INT-1 or above
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior exposure to azacitidine but no more than one cycle of decitabine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Off chemotherapy for 2 weeks prior to entering this study and have recovered from the toxicities of that therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hydroxyurea is permitted for control of elevated WBC prior to treatment and can be continued for the first 4 weeks of therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ESAs, GCSF or other growth factors are permitted on therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate cardiac functions assessed by 2D ECHO (NYHA cardiac III-IV excluded)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate end organ function with creatinine </= 2mg/dL and total bilirubin </= 2mg/dL, AST and ALT </= or = 2.5 X institutional ULN
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled intercurrent illness including, but not limited to, symptomatic congestive heart failure, unstable angina pectoris, or psychiatric illness/social situations that would limit compliance with study requirements
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion, HPV 16 positive, and a history of smoking and alcohol use. She is menopausal and uses no contraception.
